verbs.description: [ARG0: supreme court] [V: allows] [ARG1: trial in census case to proceed the supreme court] late friday refused the trump administration request to postpone a trial in lawsuits challenging its decision to add a citizenship question to the 2020 census the court rejected the administration request without explanation justices clarence thomas samuel alito and neil gorsuch of the high court conservative wing said they would have granted the application the trial which is scheduled to sta clarence thomas stefani reynolds supreme court supreme court neil gorsuch trump administration court samuel alito
